resources.string: Oops, can\'t connect to server. Please check your connection to internet or contact our office.
Oops, there\'s something error on server, please try again in a moment or contact us. (%1$d)
Oops, there\'s something error on apps, please contact our customer service.
Oops, server not found, please try again in a moment or contact us
Oops, you\'ve sent too many request, please try again later or contact us
Oops, network failure. Please check your internet connection.
Oops, connection timed out. Please check your connection to internet
Oops, you seem to be offline. Please check your connection to internet.
